name: ZXTC's anime
description:
A merge of models custom fine-tuned on anime-style images for a total of 37k samples, with an emphasis on unusual poses and hands. The base model used was a mix of:

Hentai Diffusion 17 https://www.cognitionai.org/hdmainpage

PurePornPlus 1.0 https://civitai.com/models/1235/purepornplus-merge
